Class DebugSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lukaskoerfer.gradle.debugging.model.DebugSpec
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugConfiguration

    public class DebugSpec
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes how to debug JVM processes
